Sentencas: Yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ), which is a ceramic material, has a number of applications such as a refractory, thermal barrier coating and as a solid electrolyte for a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Ductile mode machining of the micro pattern made on YSZ using ultra-precision shaping with a diamond tool

Sentencas: Micro patterning the YSZ can increase the efficiency of the SOFC, but YSZ is difficult to mechanically machin.
Titulo: Ductile mode machining of the micro pattern made on YSZ using ultra-precision shaping with a diamond tool

Sentencas: A few researchers have reported that an ultra-fine pattern can be mechanically machined on ceramic materials with no brittle fracture with a depth of cut close to sub-micrometers (called ductile mode machining).
Titulo: Ductile mode machining of the micro pattern made on YSZ using ultra-precision shaping with a diamond tool

Sentencas: In the present study, the conditions for ductile mode machining of YSZ were studied.
Titulo: Ductile mode machining of the micro pattern made on YSZ using ultra-precision shaping with a diamond tool

Sentencas: A 3-axis ultra-precision machine system and 90A degrees diamond tool were employed to machine a micro pattern on YSZ.
Titulo: Ductile mode machining of the micro pattern made on YSZ using ultra-precision shaping with a diamond tool

Sentencas: At first, when YSZ was machined with a depth of cut of 1 mu m and 10 passes, the micro pattern was entirely fractured due to the brittleness of YSZ.
Titulo: Ductile mode machining of the micro pattern made on YSZ using ultra-precision shaping with a diamond tool

Sentencas: Next, the micro pattern was machined with a depth of cut of 1 mu m and 1 pass to verify how multi-pass machining affected the brittle fracture.
Titulo: Ductile mode machining of the micro pattern made on YSZ using ultra-precision shaping with a diamond tool

Sentencas: A sparse brittle fracture occurred, which meant the depth of cut of 1 mu m was too large for ductile mode machining.
Titulo: Ductile mode machining of the micro pattern made on YSZ using ultra-precision shaping with a diamond tool

Sentencas: A mix of ductile mode machining and brittle mode machining was observed.
Titulo: Ductile mode machining of the micro pattern made on YSZ using ultra-precision shaping with a diamond tool

Sentencas: Thirdly, when YSZ was machined with a depth of cut of 0.5 mu m by 20 passes, the micro pattern was clearly machined with ductile mode machining.
Titulo: Ductile mode machining of the micro pattern made on YSZ using ultra-precision shaping with a diamond tool

Sentencas: Thus, a transition point between ductile mode machining and brittle mode machining should exist at a depth of cut between 0.5 mu m and 1 mu m. A nanoscrach test was used to determine the transition point.
Titulo: Ductile mode machining of the micro pattern made on YSZ using ultra-precision shaping with a diamond tool

Sentencas: The transition point was found to be 875 nm by analyzing the lateral force and the machined surface.
Titulo: Ductile mode machining of the micro pattern made on YSZ using ultra-precision shaping with a diamond tool
